description: Enterprise techniques used by RemoteCMD, ATT&CK software S0166 v1.1
name: RemoteCMD (S0166)

techniques.comment: [RemoteCMD](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0166) copies a file over to the remote system before execution.(Citation: Symantec Buckeye)
[RemoteCMD](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0166) can execute commands remotely by creating a new schedule task on the remote system(Citation: Symantec Buckeye)
[RemoteCMD](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0166) can execute commands remotely by creating a new service on the remote system.(Citation: Symantec Buckeye)
